[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]
Be still, my soul: The Lord is on thy side; With patience bear thy cross of grief or pain.
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]E[/ch]
Leave to thy God to order and provide; In ev'ry change he faithful will remain.
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Be still, my soul: Thy best, thy heav'nly Friend, Thru thorny ways leads to a joyful end.

[Verse 2]
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]
Be still, my soul: Thy God doth undertake; To guide the future as he has the past.
[ch]C[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch]     [ch]Dm[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]E[/ch]
Thy hope, thy confidence let nothing shake; All now mysterious shall be bright at last.
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]Dm[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]              
Be still, my soul: The waves and winds still know; His voice who ruled them while he dwelt below.

[Verse 3]
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
Be still, my soul: The hour is hast'ning on; When we shall be forever with the Lord,
[ch]C[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]Dm[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]E[/ch]
When disappointment, grief, and fear are gone; Sorrow forgot, love's purest joys restored.
[ch]C[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]Dm[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Be still, my soul: When change and tears are past; All safe and blessed we shall meet at last.

name: My Heavenly Father Loves Me
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse]
 [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
Whenever I hear the song of a bird
     [ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]
Or look at the blue, blue sky,
            [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Whenever I feel the rain on my face
        [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
Or the wind as it rushes by,
               [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
Whenever I touch a velvet rose
      [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Or walk by our lilac tree,
       [ch]F[/ch]
I’m glad that I live in this beautiful world
                             [ch]C[/ch]
Heav’nly Father created for me

[Verse]
 [ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
He gave me my eyes that I might see
     [ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]Em[/ch]
The color of butterfly wings.
     [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
He gave me my ears that I might hear

      [ch]F[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
The magical sound of things.
                [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
He gave me my life, my mind, my heart:
[ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
I thank him rev’rently
[ch]F[/ch]
For all his creations, of which I’m a part
                                  [ch]C[/ch]
Yes, I know Heav’nly Father loves me.

name: I Am A Child Of God

[Verse]
[ch]D[/ch]      [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
I am a child of God,
I am a child of God,
I am a child of God. 
    [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]    [ch]Asus2[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]
And he has sent me    here,
And so my  needs are great;
Rich blessings are in store;
[ch]Ebm7b5[/ch]             [ch]Asus2[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] 
Has    given me an earthly home
Help me to understand    his words
If I but learn to  do    his will
     [ch]E9[/ch]  [ch]E7[/ch]  [ch]Amaj7/E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]   [ch]A[/ch]
With parents kind    and dear. 
Before   it  grows   too late.
I'll live with him   once more.

[ch]D[/ch]
Lead me, guide me,
[ch]Em[/ch]     [ch]Em6[/ch]
walk beside me,
[ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Asus2[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]

Teach me all that I must do
   [ch]G[/ch]         Aadd6 [ch]A[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]
To live with him   someday.

name: Jte Ldis Quand Même
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]A7[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch] 
 On aurait pu se dire tout ça,
 [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]A7[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch] 
 Ailleurs qu'au café d'en bas,
 [ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]A7[/ch] 
 Que t'allais p't'être partir,
 [ch]A#(dim)[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch] 
 Et p't'être même pas rev'nir,
 [ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]A4[/ch] 
 Mais en tout cas c'qu'est sûr,
                [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch] 
 C'est qu'on pouvait en rire...

 Alors on va s'quitter comme ça,
 Comme des cons dans l'café d'en bas,
 Comme dans une série B,
 On est tous les deux mauvais,
 On s'est moqué tel'ment fois
 Des gens qui faisait ça...

 [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]A7[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch] 
 Mais j'trouve pas d'refrain à notre histoire,
 [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]A7[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch] 
 Tous les mots qui m'viennent sont dérisoires,
 [ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]A7[/ch]   [ch]A#(dim)[/ch]             [ch]Bm[/ch] 
 J'sais bien qu'l'ai trop dit, mais j'le dis quand même,
 [ch]Em7[/ch]   [ch]A7[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch] 
             Je t'aime...

 J'voulais seulement te dire merci,
 Pour tout le mal qu'on s'est pas dit,
 Certains rigolent déjà,
 J'm'en fout, j'les aimais pas,
 On avait l'air trop bien , y'en a qui supporte pas...

 Refrain

content.text:

        [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]

        [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]

      [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]

       [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]

name: Jesus Lover Of My Soul
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1]
[ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Jesus, lover of my soul,
       [ch]Dm[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
Let me to thy bosom fly,
          [ch]G7[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
While the nearer waters roll,
          [ch]G7[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]
While the tempest still is high.
              [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
Hide me, O my Savior, hide,
                  [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]G7[/ch]
Till the storm of life is past.
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
Safe into the haven guide;
               [ch]G6[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
Oh, receive my soul at last.

[Verse 2]
[ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Other refuge have I none;

name: We Thank Thee O God For A Prophet

content.text:
[Verse 1]
     [ch]D[/ch]
We thank thee, O God, for a prophet
                            [ch]A[/ch]
To guide us in these latter days.
   [ch]D[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
We thank thee for sending the gospel
    [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
To lighten our minds with its rays.
                   [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
We thank thee for every blessing
                          [ch]A[/ch]
Bestowed by thy bounteous hand.
    [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
We feel it a pleasure to serve thee
             [ch]A7[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
And love to obey thy command.


[Verse 2]
      [ch]D[/ch]
When dark clouds of trouble hang o’er us
                            [ch]A[/ch]
And threaten our peace to destroy,
[ch]D[/ch]                                     [ch]G[/ch]
There is hope smiling brightly before us,
[ch]D[/ch]                [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
And we know that deliv’rance is nigh.
                 [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
We doubt not the Lord nor his goodness.
                                  [ch]A[/ch]
We’ve proved him in days that are past.
    [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
The wicked who fight against Zion
               [ch]A7[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]
Will surely be smitten at last.


[Verse 3]
       [ch]D[/ch]
We’ll sing of his goodness and mercy.
                            [ch]A[/ch]
We’ll praise him by day and by night,
  [ch]D[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
Rejoice in his glorious gospel,
[ch]D[/ch]                [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
And bask in its life-giving light.
            [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]
Thus on to eternal perfection
                              [ch]A[/ch]
The honest and faithful will go,
  [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
While they who reject this glad message
                  [ch]A7[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]
Shall never such happiness know.

name: A Poor Wayfaring Man Of Grief
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse 1]
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
A poor, wayfaring Man of grief Hath often crossed me on my way,
  [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
Who sued so humbly for relief That I could never answer nay.
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
I had not pow’r to ask his name, Whereto he went, or whence he came;
     [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Yet there was something in his eye That won my love; I knew not why.

[Verse 2]
       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]
Once, when my scanty meal was spread, He entered; not a word he spake,
 [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Just perishing for want of bread. I gave him all; he blessed it, brake,
    [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
And ate, but gave me part again. Mine was an angel’s portion then,
     [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D7[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
For while I fed with eager haste, The crust was manna to my taste.

[Verse 3]
   [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]
I spied him where a fountain burst Clear from the rock; his strength was gone.
    [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
The heedless water mocked his thirst; He heard it, saw it hurrying on.
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
I ran and raised the suff’rer up; Thrice from the stream he drained my cup,
        [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Dipped and returned it running o’er; I drank and never thirsted more.

[Verse 4]
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
’Twas night; the floods were out; it blew A winter hurricane aloof.
     [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
I heard his voice abroad and flew To bid him welcome to my roof.
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
I warmed and clothed and cheered my guest And laid him on my couch to rest,
   [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Then made the earth my bed and seemed In Eden’s garden while I dreamed.

[Verse 5]
         [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Stript, wounded, beaten nigh to death, I found him by the highway side.
   [ch]G[/ch]                         [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
I roused his pulse, brought back his breath, Revived his spirit, and supplied
      [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
Wine, oil, refreshment—he was healed. I had myself a wound concealed,
    [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
But from that hour forgot the smart, And peace bound up my broken heart.

[Verse 6]
    [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
In pris’n I saw him next, condemned To meet a traitor’s doom at morn.
     [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D7[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]
The tide of lying tongues I stemmed, And honored him ’mid shame and scorn.
    [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
My friendship’s utmost zeal to try, He asked if I for him would die.
     [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
The flesh was weak; my blood ran chill, But my free spirit cried, “I will!”

[Verse 7]
      [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
Then in a moment to my view The stranger started from disguise.
     [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D7[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
The tokens in his hands I knew; The Savior stood before mine eyes.
     [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
He spake, and my poor name he named, “Of me thou hast not been ashamed.
      [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D7[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
These deeds shall thy memorial be; Fear not, thou didst them unto me.”

name: Come Follow Me
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
"Come, follow me," the Savior said.
[ch]A[/ch]          [ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Then let us in his footsteps tread,
[ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Gm[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
For thus alone can we be one
[ch]F[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
With God's own loved, begottn Son.

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
"Come, follow me," a simple phrase,
[ch]A[/ch]            [ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
Yet truth's sublime, effulgent rays
[ch]Cm[/ch]            [ch]Gm[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Are in these simple words combined
[ch]F[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
To urge, inspire the human mind.

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
Is it enough alone to know
[ch]A[/ch]             [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
That we must follow him below,
[ch]Cm[/ch]              [ch]Gm[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
While trav'ling thru this vale of tears?
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
No, this extends to holier spheres.

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
Not only shall we emulate
[ch]A[/ch]                [ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
His course while in this earthly state,
[ch]Cm[/ch]             [ch]Gm[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
But when we're freed from present cares,
[ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]
If with our Lord we would be heirs.

Capo 1st fret. 

    [ch]D[/ch]   ([ch]A7[/ch]) [ch]D[/ch]  Ddmin7 [ch]D[/ch]

v.4 A   land holy      and pure,
   ([ch]A[/ch])   [ch]D[/ch]  Ddmin [ch]D[/ch]
The path rugged   and steep?
Your soul weary within,
Now the journey's begun;
Where all trouble doth end,
          [ch]D6[/ch] [ch]Asus2[/ch] [ch]D6[/ch]
Are there briars   and 
As you toil 'neath your
There is One who still
And your life shall be
[ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Gadd9[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]A[/ch]
thorns on    the way?
burden       of care?
beckons      to you. 
free   from  all sin,
[ch]D[/ch]  ([ch]A7[/ch])  [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]Gadd9[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Do sharp stones cut   your feet
Does the load   heavy      seem
So look upward  in         joy
Where no tears  shall be   shed,
[ch]A7[/ch]     [ch]F#[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
As you struggle to rise
You are forced now to lift?
And take hold of his hand;
For no sorrows   remain. 
[ch]G6[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]A7[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]Gadd9[/ch] [ch]D6[/ch] [ch]A7[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
To the heights thru the heat  of the day?
Is there no    one  your burden  to  share?
He will lead you to heights that are new--
Take his hand and  with him   enter  in.

content.text:
[verse 1]

[ch]Eb[/ch]         [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Fm7[/ch]  [ch]Ab[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]

[ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]Cm[/ch]                 [ch]Ab[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]

[ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]DM7[/ch]   [ch]Gm[/ch]

[ch]Fm7[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]    [ch]Ab[/ch]  [ch]Fm7[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]             [ch]DM7[/ch]   [ch]Gm[/ch]
